tool_description:
Effortlessly integrate translation capabilities into your applications with our Translation API. 
This API provides real-time translation, language detection, and text preprocessing, ensuring high-quality, context-aware translations. Ideal for global communication, content localization, and enhancing user experience
name: Translation API
title: Translation API

api_list.name: Reverse Translate
api_list.description: This verifies the accuracy of the translated text and provides feedback on the translated text
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://translation-api10.p.rapidapi.com/reverse-translate/Buen día/Good day/es"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translation-api10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://translation-api10.p.rapidapi.com/reverse-translate/{original_text}/{user_translated_text}/{target_language}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translation-api10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Translate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://translation-api10.p.rapidapi.com/translate/Hello/ar"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translation-api10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://translation-api10.p.rapidapi.com/translate/{text}/{target_language}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translation-api10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List all Languages
api_list.description: This only Lists all available languages that are supported
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://translation-api10.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translation-api10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())
